name: HomeLink
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Enabling the HomeLink skill allows drivers with compatible HomeLink-equipped vehicles to activate home automation devices connected to their Amazon Alexa account. Once enabled, drivers can customize the HomeLink buttons on their Amazon Alexa account to activate individual devices or set up entire scenes - all activated by a HomeLink button press from inside the car.
